channel.title: Searx on sahilister's Reimagined Doodle

item.title: How I Installed Searx Using Yunohost
item.description: I had an AWS account which offers 12 months of Amazon EC2 with 750 hours/month free on initial sign up. It’s called free tier by Amazon and offers a t2.micro instance having 1vCPU, 1 GB RAM and 30 GB of storage. I would fire up an instance now and then for trying out various services and just play around with it. I found about YunoHost while trying to install Matrix homeserver (Synapse).
